title: Which SEO tool can I buy if I only have $20? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think Noone Needs an SEO Tool if he/she just Invest Some in Some Free Videos on Youtube and Invest Some time in Tools like SEMrush, UberSuggest & some more which are Cheaper then $20. Wanna Talk More then You can DM me on Instagram at “socialmediayash”

You can buy ahrefs SEMrush … Now question comes your mind these are expensive. There is a website which provide these tools shared basis Which costs approximately $4 /month If you are beginner I recommend you use free tools like ubersuggest. Ubersuggest provide few free search daily basis.
